changes.title: Added
changes: • `a!ocr` has been added. Now you can read text from your images, no need to be retyping it.
• `a!translate` has been added as well. This allows you for text translation, when necessary.

changes.title: Added
changes: • `a!lock` and `a!unlock` were added. Use these commands when your channels become **TOO HOT**!
• `a!kick` was also added. You heard us right, folks! You don't only ban people @here!

changes.title: Improved
changes: • `a!ban`/`a!tempban` have got new embeds and they lost unnecessary wait time. Why, <@!348591272476540928>?

changes.title: Fixed
changes: • The aforementioned commands also got a bug fix for equal role hierarchy and lost the `CANT BAN BOTS` thing. Why have that? lol

changes.title: Improved
changes: • Help command now works a lot better. It also includes a home button now!

changes.title: Added
changes:
• Aeon Dashboard is now available for everyone to use.
https://aeonbot.xyz

changes.title: Added
changes: • `a!minify` has been added to suit your minifying needs.

changes.title: Fixed
changes: • `a!play` now shows an error if there are no songs for the query.
• `a!skip` now shows the skipped and now playing song correctly.
• `a!volume` now shows an error if there is no song playing.
• `a!queue` now shows an error if the queue is empty.

changes.title: Added
changes: • Added a oldest user(s) command.

changes.title: Lunah did this
changes: • A crap ton of bug fixes
• Making the bot work in threads
• Providing hosting

changes.title: Fixed
changes: • Help no longer causes `This interaction failed` errors.
• Help drop-down menu is now properly being removed on timeout instead of raising an error.

changes.title: Fixed
changes: • Pages no longer act funky when two messages having pagination sessions.

changes.title: Added
changes: • Music has been added to Aeon.

changes.title: But that is not all
changes: Development of Aeon has now been brought back from the dead
and you should expect to see more epic features soon.
